thread.title: What Should We Make of the Stock-Price Drop?

author: James Mackintosh
title: What Should We Make of the Stock-Price Drop?
text:
Good news, it seems, is bad news again.
Payroll figures that showed more jobs and more pay for Americans sparked a market decline Friday that only got worse on Monday.
Over the past two trading days, the S&P 500 fell by 6.1%â€”the steepest such drop since August 2015, but something that has happened on average once every two years since...
